description: The 2026 Louisville Slugger Meta Drop 13 USA Tee Ball Bat is engineered for young players looking to enhance their game with a balanced swing feel and a one-piece composite construction. With a USA Baseball certification and a substantial 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, this bat is crafted to deliver powerful hits off a tee. Its vibrant red, gold, and black colorway adds a sleek look, while the synthetic leather grip ensures exceptional comfort during play. The molded end cap is designed to maximize barrel profile and swing speed, making it the ideal choice for tee ball enthusiasts seeking performance and style.
